name: Control Zone
description:
Hello everyone!

My game for this year is much better that the previous year. But will it be better that other games? Well, probably not. But that's not important. I am happy with myself and with my game. I made it alone in 2 days and I think it's good enough. 

The game is about momentum and control zones, where you can control your spaceship. I liked the idea and this concept didn't seem very hard to program. But I still enjoy playing it. I even added Freeroam mode! (Btw. the portals in freeroam mode look like they're turned off, but the work.)

Thank you for reading (and maybe playing my game).

CONTROLS:

  • W/Up - acceleration
  • A/Left - left
  • D/Right - right
  • Spacebar - restart level
  • Esc - quit the game

(Due to the nature of Godot Engine, there may be another controls as well [on the gamepad for example]).
